trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsMouseOver" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the stylus is captured to this element.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否將手寫筆擷取至這個項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element has stylus capture; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目已具有手寫筆捕捉則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Touch, mouse, and stylus input exist in a particular relationship.
trans-unit.target: 觸控、 滑鼠及手寫筆輸入存在於特定的關聯性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsStylusCaptured" /> property changes on this element.
trans-unit.target: 當這個項目的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsStylusCaptured" /> 屬性值變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: This member is a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] event, not a routed event.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]事件，則不是路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsStylusCaptured" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsStylusCaptured" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that determines whether stylus capture is held by this element, including child elements and control compositing.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值決定手寫筆捕捉是否由這個項目 (包括子項目和複合控制項) 保有。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if stylus capture is held within this element; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果手寫筆捕捉保留在這個項目內則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Touch, mouse, and stylus input exist in a particular relationship.
trans-unit.target: 觸控、 滑鼠及手寫筆輸入存在於特定的關聯性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsStylusCaptureWithin" /> property changes on this element.
trans-unit.target: 當這個項目的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsStylusCaptureWithin" /> 屬性值變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: This member is a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] event, not a routed event.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]事件，則不是路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsStylusCaptureWithin" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsStylusCaptureWithin" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the stylus position corresponds to hit test results, which take element compositing into account.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出手寫筆位置是否與點擊測試結果相對應，該結果會將複合項目納入考量。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the stylus is over the same element as a hit test; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果手寫筆位於與點擊測試相同的項目上方則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Unlike <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsStylusOver%2A>, this property is only `true` if the stylus is over the element.
trans-unit.target: 不同於<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsStylusOver%2A>，這個屬性才`true`如果手寫筆在元素上方。

trans-unit.source: If the stylus is instead over a child element or over elements that are part of an element's deeper compositing, this property will be `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果手寫筆改為透過子元素或元素的更深入的複合 （compositing） 的一部分的項目，這個屬性會是`false`。

trans-unit.source: Unless you know how a control is composited (for example, you use this property in a custom control template for a control that you define), this property might return unexpected results.
trans-unit.target: 除非您知道控制項的複合 （例如，您使用這個屬性的自訂控制項範本中的控制項，您定義），這個屬性可能會傳回非預期的結果。

trans-unit.source: For most scenarios where you are not authoring controls, use <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsStylusOver%2A> instead.
trans-unit.target: 大部分的情況下都不製作控制項，使用<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsStylusOver%2A>改為。

trans-unit.source: If this element has stylus capture and this property is `true` at the time of capture, this property remains `true` until stylus capture is lost and the stylus is not over its bounds.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個項目具有手寫筆擷取，而且這個屬性是`true`在擷取時，這個屬性會保持`true`直到手寫筆擷取遺失，且其範圍不是手寫筆。

trans-unit.source: Touch, mouse, and stylus input exist in a particular relationship.
trans-unit.target: 觸控、 滑鼠及手寫筆輸入存在於特定的關聯性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the stylus is located over this element (including visual child elements).
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示手寫筆是否位於這個項目上方 (包括視覺化子項目)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the stylus is over the element or its child elements; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果手寫筆位於項目或其子項目上方則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If this element has stylus capture, this property remains `true` until stylus capture is lost and the pointer is out of its bounds.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個項目具有手寫筆擷取，這個屬性會保留`true`直到手寫筆擷取是遺失而且已超出其範圍的指標。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a key is pressed while focus is on this element.
trans-unit.target: 焦點在這個項目上方且按下按鍵時發生。

trans-unit.source: Key handling interacts with other platform features such as commanding and text composition.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵處理互動與其他的平台功能，例如命令和撰寫文字。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyDown> event is a lower-level text input event that might not behave as expected on certain controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyDown>是可能無法如預期般特定控制項的較低層級文字輸入的事件。

trans-unit.source: This is because some controls have control compositing or class handling that provides a higher-level version of text input handling and related events.
trans-unit.target: 這是因為有些控制項會有複合控制項，或提供文字的高階版本的類別處理輸入處理和相關事件。

trans-unit.source: This event creates an alias for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.KeyDown?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event for this class so that <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyDown> is part of the class members list when <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> is inherited as a base element.
trans-unit.target: 此事件會建立一個別名<xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.KeyDown?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加這個類別的事件，讓<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyDown>屬於類別的成員 清單時<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>繼承基底的項目。

trans-unit.source: Event handlers that are attached to the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyDown> event are attached to the underlying <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.KeyDown?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event and receive the same event data instance.
trans-unit.target: 事件處理常式附加至<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyDown>事件會附加至基礎<xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.KeyDown?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。

trans-unit.target: 路由事件資訊

trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.target: 路由策略

trans-unit.source: Bubbling
trans-unit.target: 反昇

trans-unit.source: Delegate
trans-unit.target: Delegate - 委派

trans-unit.source: The corresponding tunneling event is <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewKeyDown>.
trans-unit.target: 對應通道的事件<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewKeyDown>。

trans-unit.source: Override <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.OnKeyDown%2A> to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.OnKeyDown%2A>實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyDown" /> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyDown" /> 路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered.
trans-unit.target: 註冊路由事件時，會建立路由事件識別項。

trans-unit.source: These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event.
trans-unit.target: 這些識別項包含用於加入事件擁有者的識別名稱、擁有者類型、處理常式類型、路由策略和公用程式方法。

trans-unit.source: You can use these identifiers to add class handlers.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這些識別項來加入類別處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about registering routed events, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需註冊路由事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需使用路由事件識別項來加入類別處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a key is released while focus is on this element.
trans-unit.target: 焦點在這個項目上方且放開按鍵時發生。

trans-unit.source: This event creates an alias for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.KeyUp?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event for this class so that <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyUp> is part of the class members list when <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> is inherited as a base element.
trans-unit.target: 此事件會建立一個別名<xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.KeyUp?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加這個類別的事件，讓<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyUp>屬於類別的成員 清單時<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>繼承基底的項目。

trans-unit.source: Event handlers that are attached to the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyUp> event are attached to the underlying <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.KeyUp?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event and receive the same event data instance.
trans-unit.target: 事件處理常式附加至<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyUp>事件會附加至基礎<xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.KeyUp?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。

trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.KeyUp" /> 路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered.
trans-unit.target: 註冊路由事件時，會建立路由事件識別項。

trans-unit.source: These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event.
trans-unit.target: 這些識別項包含用於加入事件擁有者的識別名稱、擁有者類型、處理常式類型、路由策略和公用程式方法。

trans-unit.source: You can use these identifiers to add class handlers.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這些識別項來加入類別處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about registering routed events, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需註冊路由事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需使用路由事件識別項來加入類別處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when this element loses logical focus.
trans-unit.target: 此元素失去邏輯焦點時發生。

trans-unit.source: Logical focus differs from keyboard focus if focus is deliberately forced away by using a method call but the previous keyboard focus exists in a different scope.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用方法呼叫刻意強制焦點，但上一個鍵盤焦點存在於不同範圍中，則邏輯焦點會與鍵盤焦點不同。

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, keyboard focus remains where it is, and the element where a <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.Focus%2A> method is called still gets logical focus.
trans-unit.target: 在此案例中、 鍵盤焦點會維持為，其所在和項目位置<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.Focus%2A>方法呼叫仍取得邏輯焦點。

trans-unit.source: A more precise interpretation of this event is that it is raised when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsFocused%2A> property of an element in the route changes from `true` to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件的更精確的解釋是它時引發的值<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsFocused%2A>屬性路由的項目從變更`true`至`false`。

trans-unit.source: Because this event uses bubbling routing, the element that loses focus might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached.
trans-unit.target: 由於這個事件會使用反昇路由，失去焦點的項目可能是子元素，而非項目實際附加事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A> in the event data to determine the actual element that gained focus.
trans-unit.target: 請檢查<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A>事件資料來判斷實際取得焦點的項目中。

trans-unit.target: 如需註冊路由事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>。

trans-unit.target: 如需使用路由事件識別項來加入類別處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the keyboard is no longer focused on this element.
trans-unit.target: 鍵盤不再以此元素為焦點時發生。

trans-unit.source: Because this event uses bubbling routing, the element that lost focus might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached.
trans-unit.target: 由於這個事件會使用反昇路由，失去焦點的項目可能是子元素，而非項目實際附加事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A> in the event data to determine the actual element that lost focus.
trans-unit.target: 請檢查<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A>事件資料來判斷實際失去焦點的項目中。

trans-unit.source: This event creates an alias for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event for this class, so that <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostKeyboardFocus> is part of the class members list when <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> is inherited as a base element.
trans-unit.target: 此事件會建立一個別名<xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件，這個類別，以便<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostKeyboardFocus>屬於類別的成員 清單時<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>繼承基底的項目。

trans-unit.source: Event handlers that are attached to the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostKeyboardFocus> event are attached to the underlying <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event and receive the same event data instance.
trans-unit.target: 事件處理常式附加至<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostKeyboardFocus>事件會附加至基礎<xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered.
trans-unit.target: 註冊路由事件時，會建立路由事件識別項。

trans-unit.source: These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event.
trans-unit.target: 這些識別項包含用於加入事件擁有者的識別名稱、擁有者類型、處理常式類型、路由策略和公用程式方法。

trans-unit.source: You can use these identifiers to add class handlers.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這些識別項來加入類別處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about registering routed events, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需註冊路由事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when this element loses mouse capture.
trans-unit.target: 此元素失去滑鼠擷取時發生。

trans-unit.source: When an element captures the mouse, it receives mouse input even if the pointer is outside its bounds.
trans-unit.target: 當項目捕捉到滑鼠時，它收到滑鼠輸入，即使指標位於其範圍外。

trans-unit.source: The mouse is typically captured only during drag-and-drop operations.
trans-unit.target: 滑鼠通常只會在拖放作業期間擷取。

trans-unit.source: Because this event uses bubbling routing, the element that loses capture might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached.
trans-unit.target: 由於這個事件會使用反昇路由，失去擷取項目可能是子元素，而非項目實際附加事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A> in the event data to determine the actual element that lost capture.
trans-unit.target: 請檢查<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A>事件資料來判斷實際遺失擷取的項目中。

trans-unit.source: This event creates an alias for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.LostMouseCapture?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event for this class, so that <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostMouseCapture> is part of the class members list when <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> is inherited as a base element.
trans-unit.target: 此事件會建立一個別名<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.LostMouseCapture?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件，這個類別，以便<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostMouseCapture>屬於類別的成員 清單時<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>繼承基底的項目。

trans-unit.source: Event handlers that are attached to the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostMouseCapture> event are attached to the underlying <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.LostMouseCapture?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event and receive the same event data instance.
trans-unit.target: 事件處理常式附加至<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostMouseCapture>事件會附加至基礎<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.LostMouseCapture?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when this element loses stylus capture.
trans-unit.target: 此元素失去手寫筆擷取時發生。

trans-unit.source: When an element captures the stylus, it receives stylus input even if the pointer is outside its bounds.
trans-unit.target: 當項目擷取手寫筆時，即使指標位於其範圍外接收手寫筆輸入。

trans-unit.source: The stylus is typically captured only during drag-and-drop operations.
trans-unit.target: 通常只會在拖放作業期間擷取手寫筆。

trans-unit.source: Because this event uses bubbling routing, the element that loses focus might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached.
trans-unit.target: 由於這個事件會使用反昇路由，失去焦點的項目可能是子元素，而非項目實際附加事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A> in the event data to determine the actual element that lost focus.
trans-unit.target: 請檢查<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A>事件資料來判斷實際失去焦點的項目中。

trans-unit.target: 事件處理常式附加至<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostStylusCapture>事件會附加至基礎<xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.LostStylusCapture?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when this element loses a touch capture.
trans-unit.target: 當這個項目失去觸控擷取時發生。

trans-unit.source: Routed Event Information
trans-unit.target: 路由事件資訊

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.EventHandler%601> of type <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 型別 <xref:System.EventHandler%601> 的 <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: Override <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.OnLostTouchCapture%2A> to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.OnLostTouchCapture%2A>實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。

trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostTouchCapture" /> 路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when any mouse button is pressed while the pointer is over this element.
trans-unit.target: 指標在此元素上方且按下任何滑鼠按鈕時發生。

trans-unit.source: This event creates an alias for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event for this class, so that <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseDown> is part of the class members list when <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> is inherited as a base element.
trans-unit.target: 此事件會建立一個別名<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件，這個類別，以便<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseDown>屬於類別的成員 清單時<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>繼承基底的項目。

trans-unit.source: Event handlers that are attached to the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseDown> event are attached to the underlying <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event and receive the same event data instance.
trans-unit.target: 事件處理常式附加至<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseDown>事件會附加至基礎<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseDown> event is often raised together with either <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> or <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseRightButtonDown>, which correspond to a press of one of the two standard mouse buttons.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseDown>通常就會引發事件一起可能<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>或<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseRightButtonDown>，這對應到其中的兩個標準滑鼠按鈕的按下。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> and <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseRightButtonDown> are also routed events, but they are direct routed events, and the appropriate button-specific event is raised when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType> event reaches this element along the event route.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> 和<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseRightButtonDown>也是路由的事件，但它們是直接路由的事件，就會引發適當的按鈕特定事件時<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件到達事件路由上的這個項目。

trans-unit.source: See Remarks for <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> or <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseRightButtonDown>.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱備註<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>或<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseRightButtonDown>。

trans-unit.source: A few <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> derived classes that have control-like behavior, for example, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink>, might have inherent class handling for mouse button events.
trans-unit.target: 少數<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>衍生類別，例如具有類似控制項的行為， <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink>，可能具有固有的類別處理滑鼠按鈕的事件。

trans-unit.source: The left mouse button down event is the most likely event to have class handling in a control.
trans-unit.target: 滑鼠左鍵按下事件是最有可能有控制項中的類別處理事件。

trans-unit.source: The class handling often marks the underlying <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse> class event as handled.
trans-unit.target: 處理通常類別標示基礎<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>為已處理的類別事件。

trans-unit.source: Once the event is marked handled, other instance handlers that are attached to that element are not ordinarily raised.
trans-unit.target: 一旦處理標記事件，通常無法引發另一個執行個體處理常式附加至該元素。

trans-unit.source: Any other class or instance handlers that are attached to elements in the bubbling direction towards the root in the UI tree are also not ordinarily raised.
trans-unit.target: 不通常也會引發任何其他類別或執行個體的處理常式附加到反昇方向朝向 UI 樹狀目錄中的根項目。

trans-unit.source: You can resolve the issue that is outlined in the preceding Important and still receive <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseDown> events for left mouse button down events on a derived class that has class handling by using either of these solutions:
trans-unit.target: 您可以解決問題，會在前面的重要概述，仍然會接收<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseDown>滑鼠左鍵，往下處理使用其中一個這些方案的類別衍生類別上的事件的事件：

trans-unit.source: Attach handlers for the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseDown> event, which is not marked as handled by the controls.
trans-unit.target: 附加的處理常式<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseDown>未標示為已由控制項所處理的事件。

trans-unit.source: Notice that because this is a preview event, the route starts at the root and tunnels down to the control.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，因為這是預覽事件時，路由從根目錄開始，並透過通道傳送到控制項。

trans-unit.source: Register a handler on the control procedurally by calling <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.AddHandler%2A> and choosing the signature option that enables handlers to listen for events even if they are already marked as handled in the routed event data.
trans-unit.target: 藉由呼叫可循序註冊控制項上的處理常式<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.AddHandler%2A>，然後選擇讓接聽事件，即使它們已標示為已處理路由的事件資料中的處理常式的簽章選項。

trans-unit.target: 如需註冊路由事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>。

trans-unit.target: 如需使用路由事件識別項來加入類別處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer enters the bounds of this element.
trans-unit.target: 滑鼠指標進入此元素的邊界時發生。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseEnter> is a [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md) that uses the direct event handling routing strategy.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseEnter> 是[路由傳送事件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)使用直接的事件處理路由策略。

trans-unit.source: Direct routed events are not raised along a route; instead, they are handled in the same element where they are raised.
trans-unit.target: 直接路由的事件不會引發的路由。相反地，它們會在處理相同的項目所引發的位置。

trans-unit.source: However, they do enable other aspects of routed event behavior, such as event triggers in styles.
trans-unit.target: 不過，它們會啟用路由的事件的行為，例如事件觸發程序在樣式中的其他層面。

trans-unit.source: Although <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseEnter> tracks when the mouse pointer enters the bounds of an element, this event more literally reports that the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsMouseOver%2A> property value has changed from `false` to `true` on this element.
trans-unit.target: 雖然<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseEnter>時滑鼠指標進入項目的邊界時發生，此事件的詳細追蹤逐字報告<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsMouseOver%2A>屬性值已經從`false`至`true`這個項目上。

trans-unit.source: This event creates an alias for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseEnter?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event for this class, so that <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseEnter> is part of the class members list when <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> is inherited as a base element.
trans-unit.target: 此事件會建立一個別名<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseEnter?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件，這個類別，以便<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseEnter>屬於類別的成員 清單時<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>繼承基底的項目。

trans-unit.source: Event handlers that are attached to the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseEnter> event are attached to the underlying <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseEnter?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event and receive the same event data instance.
trans-unit.target: 事件處理常式附加至<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseEnter>事件會附加至基礎<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseEnter?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Routed Event Information
trans-unit.target: 路由事件資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Direct
trans-unit.target: 直接

trans-unit.source: Delegate
trans-unit.target: Delegate - 委派

trans-unit.source: Override <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.OnMouseEnter%2A> to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.OnMouseEnter%2A>實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseEnter" /> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseEnter" /> 路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered.
trans-unit.target: 註冊路由事件時，會建立路由事件識別項。

trans-unit.source: These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event.
trans-unit.target: 這些識別項包含用於加入事件擁有者的識別名稱、擁有者類型、處理常式類型、路由策略和公用程式方法。

trans-unit.source: You can use these identifiers to add class handlers.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這些識別項來加入類別處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about registering routed events, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需註冊路由事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需使用路由事件識別項來加入類別處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer leaves the bounds of this element.
trans-unit.target: 滑鼠指標離開此元素的邊界時發生。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeave> is a [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md) that uses the direct event handling routing strategy.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeave> 是[路由傳送事件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)使用直接的事件處理路由策略。

trans-unit.source: Direct routed events are not raised along a route; instead, they are handled in the same element where they are raised.
trans-unit.target: 直接路由的事件不會引發的路由。相反地，它們會在處理相同的項目所引發的位置。

trans-unit.source: However, they do enable other aspects of routed event behavior, such as event triggers in styles.
trans-unit.target: 不過，它們會啟用路由的事件的行為，例如事件觸發程序在樣式中的其他層面。

trans-unit.source: Although <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeave> tracks when the mouse leaves an element, this event more literally reports that the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsMouseOver%2A> property value has changed from `true` to `false` on this element.
trans-unit.target: 雖然<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeave>曲目，當滑鼠離開項目時，此事件多逐字報告<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsMouseOver%2A>屬性值已經從`true`至`false`這個項目上。

trans-unit.source: This event creates an alias for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseLeave?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event for this class, so that <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeave> is part of the class members list when <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> is inherited as a base element.
trans-unit.target: 此事件會建立一個別名<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseLeave?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件，這個類別，以便<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeave>屬於類別的成員 清單時<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>繼承基底的項目。

trans-unit.source: Event handlers that are attached to the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeave> event are attached to the underlying <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseLeave?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event and receive the same event data instance.
trans-unit.target: 事件處理常式附加至<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeave>事件會附加至基礎<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseLeave?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。

trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這些識別項來加入類別處理常式。

trans-unit.target: 如需註冊路由事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需使用路由事件識別項來加入類別處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the left mouse button is pressed while the mouse pointer is over this element.
trans-unit.target: 滑鼠指標在此元素上方且按下滑鼠左按鈕時發生。

trans-unit.source: Although this [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md) seems to follow a bubbling route through an element tree, it actually is a direct routed event that is raised and reraised along the element tree by each <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>.
trans-unit.target: 雖然這[路由傳送事件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)似乎遵循反昇路由項目樹狀目錄中，透過它實際上是直接的路由的事件引發且由每個項目樹狀結構沿著 reraised <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>。

trans-unit.source: This event is one of several related events that report the mouse-button specifics of an underlying <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType> event, which is an attached event that is processed by each element along an event route.
trans-unit.target: 此事件會報告滑鼠按鈕細節的基礎的多個相關事件的其中一個<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件，這是附加的事件處理的事件路由上的每個項目。

trans-unit.source: The arguments of this event expose the arguments of the underlying <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 此事件的引數會公開基礎的引數<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: If that event is marked as handled along the event route, the mouse-button specific events are still raised; however, handlers of the mouse-button specific events must be added by explicitly calling <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.AddHandler%2A>, with the option to handle events that are already marked as handled, in order to be listeners to the event.
trans-unit.target: 如果該事件標示為已處理此事件路由上，仍然會引發滑鼠按鈕的特定事件。不過，必須加入的滑鼠按鈕的特定事件的處理常式藉由明確地呼叫<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.AddHandler%2A>，選項來處理已標記為已處理的事件、 事件接聽程式，才能使用。

trans-unit.source: Conceptually, think of this event (and other mouse-button events on <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>) to be a mouse "service" (with the service definition provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse> class).
trans-unit.target: 在概念上，將這個事件 (和其他滑鼠按鈕的事件上<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>) 是滑鼠 「 服務 」 (所提供的服務定義<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>類別)。

trans-unit.source: The event adds the convenience of not needing to check the mouse button states (left-right, up-down) of the original mouse events in the event data.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件加入不需檢查原始的滑鼠事件的事件資料中的滑鼠按鈕狀態 （左右，上下按鈕控制項） 的便利性。

trans-unit.source: For more advanced scenarios, such as checking for states of non-standard buttons, you might need to use the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse> class rather than those on <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>.
trans-unit.target: 更進階的情況下，例如檢查狀態的非標準按鈕，您可能需要使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]上<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>類別而不是那些在<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>。

trans-unit.source: A few <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> derived classes that have control-like behavior, for example, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink>, might have inherent class handling for mouse button events.
trans-unit.target: 少數<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>衍生類別，例如具有類似控制項的行為， <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink>，可能具有固有的類別處理滑鼠按鈕的事件。

trans-unit.source: The left mouse button down event is the most likely event to have class handling in a control.
trans-unit.target: 滑鼠左鍵按下事件是最有可能有控制項中的類別處理事件。

trans-unit.source: The class handling often marks the underlying <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse> class event as handled.
trans-unit.target: 處理通常類別標示基礎<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>為已處理的類別事件。

trans-unit.source: Once the event is marked handled, other instance handlers that are attached to that element are not ordinarily raised.
trans-unit.target: 一旦處理標記事件，通常無法引發另一個執行個體處理常式附加至該元素。

trans-unit.source: Any other class or instance handlers that are attached to elements in the bubbling direction towards the root in the UI tree are also not ordinarily raised.
trans-unit.target: 不通常也會引發任何其他類別或執行個體的處理常式附加到反昇方向朝向 UI 樹狀目錄中的根項目。

trans-unit.source: You can resolve the issue that is outlined in the preceding Important and still receive <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> events for left mouse button down events on a derived class that has class handling by using either of these solutions:
trans-unit.target: 您可以解決問題，會在前面的重要概述，仍然會接收<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>滑鼠左鍵，往下處理使用其中一個這些方案的類別衍生類別上的事件的事件：

trans-unit.source: Attach handlers for the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseDown> event, which is not marked as handled by the controls.
trans-unit.target: 附加的處理常式<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseDown>未標示為已由控制項所處理的事件。

trans-unit.source: Notice that because this is a preview event, the route starts at the root and tunnels down to the control.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，因為這是預覽事件時，路由從根目錄開始，並透過通道傳送到控制項。

trans-unit.source: Register a handler on the control procedurally by calling <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.AddHandler%2A> and choosing the signature option that enables handlers to listen for events even if they are already marked as handled in the routed event data.
trans-unit.target: 藉由呼叫可循序註冊控制項上的處理常式<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.AddHandler%2A>，然後選擇讓接聽事件，即使它們已標示為已處理路由的事件資料中的處理常式的簽章選項。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the left mouse button is released while the mouse pointer is over this element.
trans-unit.target: 滑鼠指標在此元素上方且放開滑鼠左按鈕時發生。

trans-unit.source: Although this [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md) seems to follow a bubbling route through an element tree, it actually is a direct routed event that is raised and reraised along the element tree by each <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>.
trans-unit.target: 雖然這[路由傳送事件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)似乎遵循反昇路由項目樹狀目錄中，透過它實際上是直接的路由的事件引發且由每個項目樹狀結構沿著 reraised <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer moves while over this element.
trans-unit.target: 滑鼠指標在此元素上方移動時發生。

trans-unit.source: This event creates an alias for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseMove?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event for this class, so that <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseMove> is part of the class members list when <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> is inherited as a base element.
trans-unit.target: 此事件會建立一個別名<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseMove?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件，這個類別，以便<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseMove>屬於類別的成員 清單時<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>繼承基底的項目。

trans-unit.source: Event handlers that are attached to the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseMove> event are attached to the underlying <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseMove?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event and receive the same event data instance.
trans-unit.target: 事件處理常式附加至<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseMove>事件會附加至基礎<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseMove?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Routed Event Information
trans-unit.target: 路由事件資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Routing strategy
trans-unit.target: 路由策略

trans-unit.source: Bubbling
trans-unit.target: 反昇

trans-unit.source: Delegate
trans-unit.target: Delegate - 委派

trans-unit.source: The corresponding tunneling event is <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseMove>.
trans-unit.target: 對應通道的事件<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseMove>。

trans-unit.source: Override <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.OnMouseMove%2A> to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.OnMouseMove%2A>實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseMove" /> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseMove" /> 路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered.
trans-unit.target: 註冊路由事件時，會建立路由事件識別項。

trans-unit.source: These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event.
trans-unit.target: 這些識別項包含用於加入事件擁有者的識別名稱、擁有者類型、處理常式類型、路由策略和公用程式方法。

trans-unit.source: You can use these identifiers to add class handlers.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這些識別項來加入類別處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about registering routed events, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需註冊路由事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需使用路由事件識別項來加入類別處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the right mouse button is pressed while the mouse pointer is over this element.
trans-unit.target: 滑鼠指標在此元素上方且按下滑鼠右按鈕時發生。

trans-unit.source: Although this [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md) seems to follow a bubbling route through an element tree, it actually is a direct routed event that is raised and reraised along the element tree by each <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>.
trans-unit.target: 雖然這[路由傳送事件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)似乎遵循反昇路由項目樹狀目錄中，透過它實際上是直接的路由的事件引發且由每個項目樹狀結構沿著 reraised <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>。

trans-unit.source: This event is one of several related events that report the mouse-button specifics of an underlying <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType> event, which is an attached event that is processed by each element along an event route.
trans-unit.target: 此事件會報告滑鼠按鈕細節的基礎的多個相關事件的其中一個<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件，這是附加的事件處理的事件路由上的每個項目。

trans-unit.source: The arguments of this event expose the arguments of the underlying <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 此事件的引數會公開基礎的引數<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: If that event is marked as handled along the event route, the mouse-button specific events are still raised; however, handlers of the mouse-button specific events must be added by explicitly calling <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.AddHandler%2A>, with the option to handle events that are already marked as handled, in order to be listeners to the event.
trans-unit.target: 如果該事件標示為已處理此事件路由上，仍然會引發滑鼠按鈕的特定事件。不過，必須加入的滑鼠按鈕的特定事件的處理常式藉由明確地呼叫<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.AddHandler%2A>，選項來處理已標記為已處理的事件、 事件接聽程式，才能使用。

trans-unit.source: Conceptually, think of this event (and other mouse-button events on <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>) to be a mouse "service" (with the service definition provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse> class).
trans-unit.target: 在概念上，將這個事件 (和其他滑鼠按鈕的事件上<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>) 是滑鼠 「 服務 」 (所提供的服務定義<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>類別)。

trans-unit.source: The event adds the convenience of not needing to check the mouse button states (left-right, up-down) of the original mouse events in the event data.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件加入不需檢查原始的滑鼠事件的事件資料中的滑鼠按鈕狀態 （左右，上下按鈕控制項） 的便利性。

trans-unit.source: For more advanced scenarios, such as checking for states of non-standard buttons, you might need to use the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse> class rather than those on <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>.
trans-unit.target: 更進階的情況下，例如檢查狀態的非標準按鈕，您可能需要使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]上<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>類別而不是那些在<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>。

trans-unit.source: Right button mouse events frequently have native handling in application scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 滑鼠右鍵事件中通常會有原生處理應用程式案例。

trans-unit.source: For instance, a right mouse button down might display a context menu.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，向下的滑鼠右按鈕可能會顯示內容功能表。

trans-unit.source: See [ContextMenu Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/contextmenu-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[ContextMenu 概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/contextmenu-overview.md)。

trans-unit.target: 如需註冊路由事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the right mouse button is released while the mouse pointer is over this element.
trans-unit.target: 滑鼠指標在此元素上方且放開滑鼠右按鈕時發生。

trans-unit.source: Although this [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md) seems to follow a bubbling route through an element tree, it actually is a direct routed event that is raised and reraised along the element tree by each <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>.
trans-unit.target: 雖然這[路由傳送事件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)似乎遵循反昇路由項目樹狀目錄中，透過它實際上是直接的路由的事件引發且由每個項目樹狀結構沿著 reraised <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>。

trans-unit.source: This event is one of several related events that report the mouse-button specifics of an underlying <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp?displayProperty=nameWithType> event, which is an attached event that is processed by each element along an event route.
trans-unit.target: 此事件會報告滑鼠按鈕細節的基礎的多個相關事件的其中一個<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件，這是附加的事件處理的事件路由上的每個項目。

trans-unit.target: 此事件的引數會公開基礎的引數<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: If that event is marked as handled along the event route, the mouse-button specific events are still raised; however, handlers of the mouse-button specific events must be added by explicitly calling <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.AddHandler%2A>, with the option to handle events that are already marked as handled, in order to be listeners to the event.
trans-unit.target: 如果該事件標示為已處理此事件路由上，仍然會引發滑鼠按鈕的特定事件。不過，必須加入的滑鼠按鈕的特定事件的處理常式藉由明確地呼叫<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.AddHandler%2A>，選項來處理已標記為已處理的事件、 事件接聽程式，才能使用。

trans-unit.source: Conceptually, think of this event (and other mouse-button events on <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>) to be a mouse "service" (with the service definition provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse> class).
trans-unit.target: 在概念上，將這個事件 (和其他滑鼠按鈕的事件上<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>) 是滑鼠 「 服務 」 (所提供的服務定義<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse>類別)。

trans-unit.source: The event adds the convenience of not needing to check the mouse button states (left-right, up-down) of the original mouse events in the event data.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件加入不需檢查原始的滑鼠事件的事件資料中的滑鼠按鈕狀態 （左右，上下按鈕控制項） 的便利性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when any mouse button is released over this element.
trans-unit.target: 在此元素上方放開任何滑鼠按鈕時發生。

trans-unit.source: This event creates an alias for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event for this class, so that <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseUp> is part of the class members list when <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> is inherited as a base element.
trans-unit.target: 此事件會建立一個別名<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件，這個類別，以便<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseUp>屬於類別的成員 清單時<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>繼承基底的項目。

trans-unit.source: Event handlers that are attached to the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseUp> event are attached to the underlying <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event and receive the same event data instance.
trans-unit.target: 事件處理常式附加至<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseUp>事件會附加至基礎<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseUp> event is often raised together with either <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> or <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseRightButtonUp>, which correspond to a release of one of the two standard mouse buttons.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseUp>通常就會引發事件一起可能<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonUp>或<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseRightButtonUp>，這對應至其中的兩個標準滑鼠按鈕的版本。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> and <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseRightButtonUp> are also routed events, but they are direct routed events, and the appropriate button-specific event is raised when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType> event reaches this element along the event route.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> 和<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseRightButtonUp>也是路由的事件，但它們是直接路由的事件，就會引發適當的按鈕特定事件時<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件到達事件路由上的這個項目。

trans-unit.source: See Remarks for <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> or <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseRightButtonUp>.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱備註<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonUp>或<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseRightButtonUp>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user rotates the mouse wheel while the mouse pointer is over this element.
trans-unit.target: 滑鼠指標在此元素上方且使用者滾動滑鼠滾輪時發生。

trans-unit.source: Focus or mouse capture take precedence over where the mouse pointer is; therefore, if you receive the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseWheel> event from a focused or captured element, the mouse pointer might actually be over another element.
trans-unit.target: 焦點或滑鼠捕捉優先於滑鼠指標所在位置。因此，如果您收到<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseWheel>事件從取得焦點或擷取的項目，將滑鼠指標可能實際上是透過另一個項目。

trans-unit.source: This event creates an alias for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseWheel?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event for this class, so that <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseWheel> is part of the class members list when <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> is inherited as a base element.
trans-unit.target: 此事件會建立一個別名<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseWheel?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件，這個類別，以便<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseWheel>屬於類別的成員 清單時<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>繼承基底的項目。

trans-unit.source: Event handlers that are attached to the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseWheel> event are attached to the underlying <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseWheel?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event and receive the same event data instance.
trans-unit.target: 事件處理常式附加至<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseWheel>事件會附加至基礎<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseWheel?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。

trans-unit.target: 註冊路由事件時，會建立路由事件識別項。

trans-unit.source: These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event.
trans-unit.target: 這些識別項包含用於加入事件擁有者的識別名稱、擁有者類型、處理常式類型、路由策略和公用程式方法。

trans-unit.source: You can use these identifiers to add class handlers.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這些識別項來加入類別處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about registering routed events, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需註冊路由事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需使用路由事件識別項來加入類別處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>。

trans-unit.source: A traversal request, which contains a property that indicates either a mode to traverse in existing tab order, or a direction to move visually.
trans-unit.target: 包含屬性的周遊要求，該屬性指出在現有定位順序中周遊的模式，或以視覺化方式移動的方向。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to move focus from this element to another element.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試將焦點從這個項目移至另一個項目。

trans-unit.source: The direction to move focus is specified by a guidance direction, which is interpreted within the organization of the visual parent for this element.
trans-unit.target: 移動焦點的方向是由指引方向所指定，該指引方向是在這個項目之視覺化父代的組織內解譯。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the requested traversal was performed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已執行要求的周遊則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Make sure you check the return value of this method.
trans-unit.target: 請確定您檢查此方法的傳回值。

trans-unit.source: A return value of `false` might be returned if the traversal runs into a tab stop that is defined by a control's composition, and the traversal request did not request to wrap.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值為`false`如果周遊時碰到的定位點由控制項的組合所定義，並周遊要求未包裝要求可能會傳回。

trans-unit.source: Returns class-specific <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> implementations for the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 為 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基礎結構傳回類別特定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> 實作。

trans-unit.source: The type-specific <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> implementation.
trans-unit.target: 因型別而異的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> 實作。

trans-unit.source: The implementation of this method is typically to call the constructor of a specific <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> implementation, and return it as the return value.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的實作會在呼叫的特定建構函式通常是<see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" />實作中，並將其傳回做為傳回值。

trans-unit.source: All <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> derived classes should implement this method in order to provide their own specific <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> implementations to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 所有<see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />衍生的類別應該實作這個方法以提供它們自己的特定<see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" />實作[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]基礎結構。

trans-unit.source: For details on implementing this pattern, see <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需實作此模式的詳細資訊，請參閱<see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.DragEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DragEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Invoked when an unhandled <see cref="E:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter" /> attached event reaches an element in its route that is derived from this class.
trans-unit.target: 當未處理的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter" /> 附加事件到達其路由中衍生自此類別的項目時叫用。

trans-unit.source: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.
trans-unit.target: 實作這個方法可為此事件加入類別處理。

trans-unit.source: This method has no default implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會具有預設的實作。

trans-unit.source: Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation.
trans-unit.target: 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 * 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case the matching event is a routed event.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: The implementation pattern of the On* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers.
trans-unit.target: 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On * 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。

trans-unit.source: It should not try to reraise the event in most cases.
trans-unit.target: 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。

trans-unit.source: Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>, derived classes of <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代<xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>，衍生的類別<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。

trans-unit.source: One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.
trans-unit.target: 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.DragEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DragEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Invoked when an unhandled <see cref="E:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragLeave" /> attached event reaches an element in its route that is derived from this class.
trans-unit.target: 當未處理的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragLeave" /> 附加事件到達其路由中衍生自此類別的項目時叫用。

trans-unit.target: 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。

trans-unit.target: 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs" /> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs" />，包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: This event data must contain the identifier for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.GotFocus" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 此事件資料必須包含 <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.GotFocus" /> 事件的識別項。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.GotFocus" /> routed event by using the event data provided.
trans-unit.target: 使用所提供的事件資料引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.GotFocus" /> 路由事件。

trans-unit.source: This method, although virtual, does have a default implementation that raises the event.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法中，雖然是虛擬的沒有預設實作會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: This On* method implementation is intended to raise the event, and this same method implementation is invoked internally to raise the event when the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsFocused%2A> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: 這在 * 方法實作用來引發事件，這個相同的方法實作會在內部叫用來引發事件時<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsFocused%2A>屬性值變更。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.OnGotFocus%2A> implementation differs from some other [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] On* implementations, which only provide a convenient way to add class handling for that event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.OnGotFocus%2A>實作不同於其他[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]上 * 只提供便利的方式來加入類別處理事件的實作。

trans-unit.source: Unless you have a deliberate and unusual need to not raise the focus events, make sure that your implementation calls the base implementation.
trans-unit.target: 除非您有故意和不尋常的需要，將不會引發焦點事件，請確定您的實作呼叫基底實作。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.GotFocus" /> event is not raised during typical user operations that ordinarily set focus to this element.
trans-unit.target: 否則，<see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.GotFocus" />通常將焦點設定至這個項目的一般使用者作業期間將不會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: If you do not intend your element to be focusable, you can prevent the element from being focusable by setting <see cref="P:System.Windows.ContentElement.Focusable" /> to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想要您可設定焦點的項目，您可以防止項目可設定焦點設定<see cref="P:System.Windows.ContentElement.Focusable" />至<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Note that by default a <see cref="P:System.Windows.ContentElement.Focusable" /> is not focusable, therefore setting <see cref="P:System.Windows.ContentElement.Focusable" /> deliberately might not be necessary.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，根據預設<see cref="P:System.Windows.ContentElement.Focusable" />不是可設定焦點，因此設定<see cref="P:System.Windows.ContentElement.Focusable" />刻意可能不是必要。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Invoked when an unhandled <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.GotKeyboardFocus" /> attached event reaches an element in its route that is derived from this class.
trans-unit.target: 當未處理的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.GotKeyboardFocus" /> 附加事件到達其路由中衍生自此類別的項目時叫用。

trans-unit.source: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.
trans-unit.target: 實作這個方法可為此事件加入類別處理。

trans-unit.source: This method has no default implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會具有預設的實作。

trans-unit.source: Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation.
trans-unit.target: 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 * 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case the matching event is a routed event.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: The implementation pattern of the On* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers.
trans-unit.target: 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On * 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。

trans-unit.source: It should not try to reraise the event in most cases.
trans-unit.target: 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。

trans-unit.source: Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>, derived classes of <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代<xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>，衍生的類別<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。

trans-unit.source: One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.
trans-unit.target: 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Invoked when an unhandled <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.GotMouseCapture" /> attached event reaches an element in its route that is derived from this class.
trans-unit.target: 當未處理的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.GotMouseCapture" /> 附加事件到達其路由中衍生自此類別的項目時叫用。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.GotTouchCapture" /> routed event that occurs when a touch is captured to this element.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.GotTouchCapture" /> 路由事件的類別處理，而這個事件會在擷取到對此項目的觸控時發生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.OnGotTouchCapture%2A> method has no default implementation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.OnGotTouchCapture%2A>方法有預設的實作。

trans-unit.source: Override <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.OnGotTouchCapture%2A> in a derived class to handle the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.GotTouchCapture> event.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.OnGotTouchCapture%2A>處理衍生類別中<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.GotTouchCapture>事件。

trans-unit.source: Be sure to call the base class’s <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.OnGotTouchCapture%2A> method so that base classes receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 確定呼叫基底類別的<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.OnGotTouchCapture%2A>方法的基底類別，接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: Invoked when an unhandled <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsKeyboardFocusedChanged" /> event is raised on this element.

trans-unit.source: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

trans-unit.source: This virtual method is raised when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsKeyboardFocused%2A> dependency property changes.
trans-unit.target: 此虛擬方法，就會引發時的值<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsKeyboardFocused%2A>相依性屬性變更。

trans-unit.source: The virtual method is raised first and can manipulate the event data as necessary.
trans-unit.target: 虛擬方法會先引發，並可以操作需要的事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Then the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsKeyboardFocusedChanged> event is raised with that same event data instance.
trans-unit.target: 然後在<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsKeyboardFocusedChanged>與該相同的事件資料執行個體就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsKeyboardFocusedChanged> event is not a routed event.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsKeyboardFocusedChanged>事件就不會路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you cannot mark it as handled in the class handler.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您無法將它標示為已處理的類別處理常式中。

trans-unit.source: This virtual method is raised when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsStylusCaptured%2A> dependency property changes its value.
trans-unit.target: 此虛擬方法，就會引發時的值<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsStylusCaptured%2A>相依性屬性變更其值。

trans-unit.source: The virtual method is raised first and can manipulate the event data as necessary.
trans-unit.target: 虛擬方法會先引發，並可以操作需要的事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Then the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsStylusCapturedChanged> event is raised with that same event data instance.
trans-unit.target: 然後在<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsStylusCapturedChanged>與該相同的事件資料執行個體就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the event is not a routed event.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，事件就不會路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you cannot mark it as handled in the class handler.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您無法將它標示為已處理的類別處理常式中。

trans-unit.source: This method has no default implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會具有預設的實作。

trans-unit.source: Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation.
trans-unit.target: 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。

trans-unit.source: You may call base either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements.
trans-unit.target: 您可能會呼叫基底之前或之後特殊處理，根據您的需求。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Invoked when an unhandled <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsStylusCaptureWithinChanged" /> event is raised on this element.
trans-unit.target: 會在對這個項目引發未處理的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsStylusCaptureWithinChanged" /> 事件時被叫用。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Invoked when an unhandled <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.KeyDown" /> attached event reaches an element in its route that is derived from this class.
trans-unit.target: 當未處理的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.KeyDown" /> 附加事件到達其路由中衍生自此類別的項目時叫用。

trans-unit.source: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.
trans-unit.target: 實作這個方法可為此事件加入類別處理。

trans-unit.source: Keystrokes are handled by a dedicated input manager.
trans-unit.target: 按鍵動作是由專用的輸入管理員處理。

trans-unit.source: Other programming features that rely on keystrokes, for example, input and command bindings, might handle the keystroke before it is exposed as a general keystroke.
trans-unit.target: 依賴按鍵，例如，輸入和命令繫結的其他程式設計功能可能會處理按鍵之前它會公開為一般的按鍵。

trans-unit.source: If these input system features mark the event as handled, then <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.OnKeyDown%2A> is not invoked.
trans-unit.target: 如果這些輸入系統功能將事件標記為已處理，然後<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.OnKeyDown%2A>不會叫用。

trans-unit.source: This method has no default implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會具有預設的實作。

trans-unit.source: Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation.
trans-unit.target: 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 * 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case the matching event is a routed event.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: The implementation pattern of the On* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers.
trans-unit.target: 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On * 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。

trans-unit.source: It should not try to reraise the event in most cases.
trans-unit.target: 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。

trans-unit.source: Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>, derived classes of <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代<xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>，衍生的類別<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。

trans-unit.source: One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.
trans-unit.target: 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Invoked when an unhandled <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.KeyUp" /> attached event reaches an element in its route that is derived from this class.
trans-unit.target: 當未處理的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.KeyUp" /> 附加事件到達其路由中衍生自此類別的項目時叫用。

trans-unit.source: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.
trans-unit.target: 實作這個方法可為此事件加入類別處理。

trans-unit.target: 按鍵動作是由專用的輸入管理員處理。

trans-unit.target: 依賴按鍵，例如，輸入和命令繫結的其他程式設計功能可能會處理按鍵之前它會公開為一般的按鍵。

trans-unit.source: If these input system features mark the event as handled, then <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.OnKeyUp%2A> is not invoked.
trans-unit.target: 如果這些輸入系統功能將事件標記為已處理，然後<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.OnKeyUp%2A>不會叫用。

trans-unit.target: 這個方法會具有預設的實作。

trans-unit.target: 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 * 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case the matching event is a routed event.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: The implementation pattern of the On* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers.
trans-unit.target: 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On * 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。

trans-unit.source: It should not try to reraise the event in most cases.
trans-unit.target: 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。

trans-unit.source: Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>, derived classes of <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代<xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>，衍生的類別<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。

trans-unit.source: One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.
trans-unit.target: 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs" /> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs" />，包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: This event data must contain the identifier for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 此事件資料必須包含 <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus" /> 事件的識別項。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus" /> routed event by using the event data that is provided.
trans-unit.target: 使用所提供的事件資料引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus" /> 路由事件。

trans-unit.source: This method, although virtual, does have a default implementation that raises the event.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法中，雖然是虛擬的沒有預設實作會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: This On* method implementation is intended to raise the event, and this same method implementation is invoked internally to raise the event when the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsFocused%2A> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: 這在 * 方法實作用來引發事件，這個相同的方法實作會在內部叫用來引發事件時<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsFocused%2A>屬性值變更。

trans-unit.source: This implementation differs from some other [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] On* implementations, which only provide a convenient way to add class handling for that event.
trans-unit.target: 這項實作不同於其他[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]上 * 只提供便利的方式來加入類別處理事件的實作。

trans-unit.source: Unless you have a deliberate and unusual need to not raise the focus events, make sure that your implementation calls the base implementation.
trans-unit.target: 除非您有故意和不尋常的需要，將不會引發焦點事件，請確定您的實作呼叫基底實作。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus" /> event is not raised during typical user operations that ordinarily set focus to this element.
trans-unit.target: 否則，<see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus" />通常將焦點設定至這個項目的一般使用者作業期間將不會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: If you do not intend your element to be focusable, you can prevent the element from being focusable by setting <see cref="P:System.Windows.ContentElement.Focusable" /> to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想要您可設定焦點的項目，您可以防止項目可設定焦點設定<see cref="P:System.Windows.ContentElement.Focusable" />至<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs" /> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Invoked when an unhandled <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.LostKeyboardFocus" /> attached event reaches an element in its route that is derived from this class.
trans-unit.target: 當未處理的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.LostKeyboardFocus" /> 附加事件到達其路由中衍生自此類別的項目時叫用。
